House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04444
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING WORKERS RIGHT TO SECURITY OF TENURE, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE ARTICLES 106 TO 109 OF BOOK III, ARTICLES 294 [279] TO 296 [281] OF BOOK VI, AND ARTICLE 303 [288] OF BOOK VII OF PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 442, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE LABOR CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Aims to totally prohibit the practice of contracting, subcontracting, manpower agency hiring, outsourcing, including those undertaken by so-called service cooperatives engaged in manpower supply thereby strengthening security of tenure and ending its abusive practices.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MENDOZA, RAYMUND DEMOCRITO C.
DATE FILED : 2016-11-16
